/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's vibrant energy.
